title: [LFT] Gold II ADC Main

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: Hey, I'm a 14 year old ADC main just looking for a friendly team to play with, my holidays start tomorrow and are until early february. I play this everyday and am usually online, I think I'm quite mature and friendly. I don't mind what division team you are at all. I can play any adc and am experienced at it, I can also play other roles well. I'm always very calm and just want to win so I go tryhard :3 Well thank you for reading, I will be checking this post frequently to check for replies, and you can also add me, my ign is Zerqq and i'll be online all day ^_^
